title: SA Style Studio Presents Fashion Loves Art Event in Chicago to Benefit the Ronald McDonald House Charities Chicagoland & Northwest Indiana
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE SA Style Studio
Fashion and Art Collaborative Event with Silent Auction to Take Place at Moonlight Studios on October 23rd 2015
CHICAGO , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- SA Style Studio announced today the Fashion Loves Art event, ( http://www.fashionlovesart.org/ ), that will be open to the public and take place on October 23rd 2015 from 6pm to 10pm . The Fashion + Art collaborative will take place at Moonlight Studios located at 1446 West Kinzie Street Chicago, IL. A portion of all proceeds from both ticket sales and the evenings silent art auction will benefit the Ronald McDonald House of Chicagoland & Northwest Indiana , ( http://rmhccni.org/ ), to help aid children battling chronic illness. An exclusively curated selection of fashion pieces will be shown on the runway for a short fashion show featuring designers Silvia Bours, Tianna Barnes , Harkiss Designs, Chicago Playground, Stello Official, Aurelia Garza , Nicole Andrews , and Filthy Haanz. As well as an array of displayed art pieces up for silent auction by artists Katrina Jackson of VH1's Black Ink Crew, Joey Africa , Miriam Zuckerman , Rome Won, and Goons. Media sponsors for the event include HALFSTACK Magazine. Tickets for the Fashion Loves Art event are currently on sale starting at $50.00 per person and can be purchased directly at http://www.fashionlovesart.org/ . Tickets must be purchased in advance of the event. VIP ticket holders will have early bird access to the art gallery, VIP gift bags featuring exclusive goods provided by The Mane Choice, Z Skin Cosmetics, Casetify, The Pure Bar, and many more!
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151014/277104LOGO
"Fashion and art have always gone hand-in-hand. Since I was young I've always considered styling an expressive art form, so naturally the concept of Fashion Loves Art seemed like an appropriate event to introduce to the Chicago market. I wanted to organize a special event that would give back to my community by way of the Ronald McDonald House," states creator of Fashion Loves Art and CEO of SA Style Studio, Stephanie Alexis . "I whole heartedly believe and support the Ronald McDonald House's effective initiatives that have aided this Chicago community, so partnering with them was a no brainer. Chicago's elite art and fashion experts are all invited to experience the Fashion Loves Art event. Together, I know we can raise funds and awareness for this incredible charity."
SA Style Studio has partnered with Ronald McDonald House of Chicagoland & Northwest Indiana to bring an exciting, interesting, and most importantly fun event to raise money and awareness for children in need. Attendees are welcome to hors d'oeuvres and beverages at cocktail hour, with the evening's music provided by Personalities Inc. Participating artists will exhibit various curated pieces in a gallery style so attendees can view items, all pieces will be available for purchase during the silent auction.
"Our Ronald McDonald House near Lurie Children's Hospital has had the opportunity to host over 22,000 family room nights annually since opening as what was the world's largest Ronald McDonald House in 2012. Our ability to offer the comfort, care and compassion to so many families only happens with the support of the local community and families, an event such as Fashion Loves Art is a prime example of this. We are thrilled to partner for this special event," states Managing Director of Ronald McDonald House near Lurie Children's Hospital, Mark Shouger .
For more information on Fashion Loves Art, to Sponsor or for Media Inquiries please email or call 1.877.841.7244.
About SA Style Studio
SA Style Studio was founded in 2014 by Stylist Stephanie Alexis White. The esteemed company's mission is to make fashion fun and easy for their clients. Offering a wide array services including: personal styling, image consulting, wardrobe styling, fashion publication consultation, trend forecasting, and acting as a brand ambassador for a variety of fashion houses. For more information on SA Style Studio, please visit http://www.sastylestudio.com/ .
About The Ronald McDonald House Chicagoland & Northwest Indiana :
Helping a sick child fight their illness takes a big enough emotional toll on a family. Adding a financial strain can make it all almost too much to bear. Ronald McDonald House Charities of Chicagoland & Northwest Indiana (RMHC-CNI) can help address those problems, whether they involve housing that's near a hospitalized child, the expense of staying together in another city, or even getting basic medical care in a vulnerable community. The mission of RMHC-CNI is to care for families of children with complex medical needs by providing comfort, compassion and a sense of community. RMHC-CNI keeps families of hospitalized children together in a 'home away from home'. For more information on Ronald McDonald House Chicagoland & Northwest Indiana please visit http://rmhccni.org/ .
